= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *sphincter-ani-internus-muscle-parasympathetic*: keep the anal canal and anus closed, aids in the expulsion of the feces, inhibit contraction
  * *Rectum - sphincter ani internus muscle, sympathetic* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_SYM_IMG AVA.PN.SYM.IMG] -> sphincter-ani-internus-muscle-sympathetic): stimulate and maintain internal anal sphincter contraction
  * *Rectum - large intestine visceral receptors* (large-intestine-visceral-receptors -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG AVA.PN.SG.DRG]): sensations of fullness and urgency, pain
  * *Rectum - puborectalis muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] -> puborectalis-muscle): inhibit defecation
  * *Rectum - superficial transverse perineal muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_PM BMA.SC.VH.PM] -> superficial-ransverse-perineal-muscle): fixation of central tendon of perineum, support of pelvic floor
  * *Rectum - coccygeus muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] -> coccygeus-muscle): pulls coccyx forward after defecation, closing in the back part of the outlet of the pelvis
  * *Rectum - corrugator cutis ani muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_PM BMA.SC.VH.PM] -> corrugator-cutis-ani-muscle): raises the skin into ridges around the margin of the anus
  * *Rectum - iliococcygeus muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] -> iliococcygeus-muscle): supports the viscera in pelvic cavity
  * *Rectum - sphincter ani externus muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_PM BMA.SC.VH.PM] -> sphincter-ani-externus-muscle): keep the anal canal and anus closed, aids in the expulsion of the feces
